text: Alojz Uran or Alojzij Uran (22 January 1945 – 11 April 2020) was a Slovenian prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was Archbishop of Ljubljana from 4 December 2004 till 28 November 2009. He resigned because of health problems. He was born in Ljubljana. On 16 December 1992, Uran was appointed Auxiliary Bishop of Ljubljana and Titular Bishop of Abula. Uran died on 11 April 2020 in Ljubljana at the age of 75.Umrl je upokojeni ljubljanski nadškof metropolit Alojz Uran ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Ljubljana Category:Roman Catholic bishops
title: Alojz Uran
